attributes.action: Make Sepsis Testing Compulsary for all ages and at all times
attributes.background: We lost our mum earlier in the year, it was a shock. we was told that among other things  she had septicemia. Mum had always suffered with urine infections and it makes us wonder that if she was tested for sepsis then maybe she would have a better chance. Hopefully we can get compulsory testing

rejection.details:
We were really sorry to hear about the loss of your mum. Please accept our sincere condolences. 

We understand that you would like to introduce compulsory sepsis testing, but we're not sure what you mean by making sepsis testing compulsory for all ages and at all times. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly when you would like people to be tested for sepsis.
